attributes.action: Have Compassion on HIV/AIDS sufferers and allow them to stay in UK
attributes.additional_details: HIV/AIDS sufferers are suffering living on minimum wage in the UK.They also face discimination in the communities as well as in detention centres.This must stop and UK as a democratic country needs to allow them to stay instead of letting them suffer on top of the disease they have.Some hiv/aids asylum seekers wait for like 8 yrs without hearing from the Home office.This is traumatising and unhuman.
